newsitem.title: USA: FTC closes probe into Camelot Corp.
newsitem.headline: FTC closes probe into Camelot Corp.

text.p: Camelot Corp said Friday the Federal Trade Commission had closed its investigation into the company and the marketing of DigiPhone, deciding that no action was warranted.

In May, Camelot, a holding company whose subsidiaries specialize in computer software, received a letter from the FTC saying it wanted to confirm that the DigiPhone software could communicate over the Internet in a full duplex manner.
DigiPhone allows computer users to make long-distance telephone calls through the Internet for the cost of a local call.
Company and commission officials were not immediately available for comment.
